entry.string: Nadir ask you to pray in Al-Qadirya Shrine, Mauseloum of Imam Mustansir and Shrine of Ali
I did pilgrimage to Najaf, Baghdad and Anjudan.
Nadir asked you to choose one of his jars again
This was my second try with Nadir’s jars.
Nadir ask you to pray in the Tomb of Mevlana and Naissa Mosque
I did pilgrimage to Konya and Al-ladhaqiyah.
Nadir asked you to choose one the goblets
I fearlessly drunk from the goblet
Nadir ask you to pray in Blue Mosque
Nadir asked you to choose one of his jars once more
This was my third try with Nadir’s jars.
Nadir asked you to choose one of his jars last time
This was my last try with Nadir’s jars.
Nadir ask you to pray in Dzhuma Mosque
You have to find grave of Grave of Grave of Ilu-Shuma
I found the grave of ancient king Ilu-Shuma
You have to find grave of Ashurbanipal
I found the grave of god king Ashurbanipal.
I found the grave of mighty king Eriba-Adad.
You have to find grave of Grave of Puzur-Ashur III
I found the grave of mighty king Puzur-Ashur III.
You have to find grave of Grave of Grave of Sargon II
I found the grave of Assyrian god king Sargon II.
You have to find grave of Grave of Grave of Shalim-Ahu
I found the grave of Assyrian god king Shalim-Ahu.
You have to find grave of Tiglath-Pileser I
I found the grave of Assyrian king Tiglath-Pileser I.
Nadir asked you to visit the Tomb of Mevalana
Nadir asked you to spend three months in hermitage, in the mountains near Al-ladhiqiyah
I fasted and prayed three months in hermitage.
You have to get contact with Mahdi
I was honoured to find way to talk to Mahdi.
You have to build shrine to Hafaza
I built the shrine named to Hafaza.
You have to buy more land
You have to grow spice and try to sell them in Bazaar
I grew spices and sold them in Bazaar.
You have to get a travel permit from the Palace of Baghdad
I applied for the travel permit and I got it.
Before starting the building you have to get permit to build
I got permit to build shrine
You have to got exporting permit before you can export your goods
I got permit to export goods to Europe.
You have to visit in city of Constantinople
You have to visit in Europe
I visited first time in Europe.
You have to visit in ten cities in Europe
I did my grand tour in Europe and visited in ten cities.
You have to visit in ten European churches
I visited in every church in Europe I managed to get in.
You have to visit in ten European museums
I visited in every possible museum in Europe.
You have stop enemies trying to conquest your lands
I won enemies who tried to conquer my lands.
You have to get contact with Hafaza/Iblis to get rain
Hafaza helped me to get rain on my fields.
You have to get contact with Hafaza/Iblis to rid off rats
Hafaza/Iblis helped me to get rid off rats.
You have to get drugs to witch
I bought drugs to get contact to Yima.
You have to do your annual drug sacrifice to Yima.
I sacrificed drugs to Yima once a month.
You have to sacrifice somebody of your blood to Iblis
I sacrificed my wife/child to Iblis.
You must get a wife for yourself!
Demand from father of the bride
You need more money to get married
I worked hard to get enough money to get married.
You have to conquest the fortress next to Anjudan
I conquested the fortress near Anjudan to please my father of bride.
You have to find one of the graves of Assyrian god kings
I found to grave of Assyrian god king.
You have to arrange your own wedding
I got married and arranged huge parties.
You have to build museum in some European city
You have to build library in some European city
You have to poem books to your library
I bought lots of books to my library.
You have to buy works of art to your museum
I bought works of art in price of 1 000 000 silver dirhams.
You have to poem books to your European library
I ordered 5643 books to my European libraries.
You have to buy works of art to your European museum
I bought works of art in price of 2 500 000 silver dirhams and send them to European museums.
You will get piece of map if you go to city of !city
I got tip from stranger and found one piece of map.
You have to arrange party to people of city !city
I arrange parties which lasted two weeks.
You have to establish shops abroad
I established my first shop abroad.
You have to do bad deeds to contact to Yima’s master
Before starting building you have to get a permit to build
I got a permit to build library.
You have to got building permit from palace before you can build museum
I got permit to build museum in city of X.
You have to kill the owner of the The Cross Key Hotel
I killed the owner of one hotel in London
Nadir ask you to choose one his jars
My first try with Nadir’s jars.
You have to deliver a mysterious vase to the tavern of Baku.
You have to smuggle drugs to Baghdad.
I smuggled stuff to get money.
You have to go to a meeting in the port of Baghdad
I met some very powerful persons
You have to get a travel permit from Constantinople's Palace before travelling to Europe
I applied for a travel permit to travel to Europe and I got it.
I conquered the heart of Umm
You have loaned some money from uncle Abdullah
I payed my loan back to my uncle
Uncle Hassan told me, that I need to bring the buckle of the guardian god Ningizzia
